pullrequest.title: Link to tool for automatic mesh geometry computation and cleanup.

content.raw:
Hi @chapulina,

Thank you very much for your comment. It seems like all the problems come from the fact that the meshes which you are trying to clean contain textures. Meshlabserver seems to crash because of this. It is funny how none of my test meshes had any texture. Thanks again for testing it out - I will do my best to figure out how to deal with this soon.
content.html:
Hi @chapulina,

Thank you very much for your comment. It seems like all the problems come from the fact that the meshes which you are trying to clean contain textures. Meshlabserver seems to crash because of this. It is funny how none of my test meshes had any texture. Thanks again for testing it out - I will do my best to figure out how to deal with this soon.
